title: Ticket #3962: Add file-transfer plugin for HDFS
description:
HDFS might be a nice way to deal with large input files. We presently only "support" it if it's mounted (via FUSE) and the submitter knows where, and thinks to use file:// URLs. This is suboptimal, not least because Nate doesn't trust FUSE. It should not be difficult to write a file-transfer plugin which uses (or natively speaks) the HDFS protocol to copy from HDFS to the execute directory.

This issue particularly affects VM universe, because it is not possible to provide a wrapper script to use HDFS natively, because there is no executable.
